thought: To solve this task I need to craft nether_bricks. Nether bricks require 4 nether bricks, which each require 1 netherrack. Therefore, I will first need to smelt the netherrack at slot 14 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 14 to slot 11 with quantity 1
